BootCurrent: 0001
BootOrder: 0001,0002,0003,0004
Timeout: 0 seconds
Boot0001* ubuntu	HD(1,GPT,abc123-def456,0x800,0x100000)/File(\EFI\ubuntu\shimx64.efi)
